statements: DELETE FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE patient_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE temperature >= 98.6 OR blood_pressure > 120;
DELETE FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE patient_id = 101 AND age > 50;
DELETE FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 10 AND temperature < 98.6;
DELETE FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DeviceData WHERE steps_count > 10000 OR heart_rate < 60;
DELETE FROM health_metrics WHERE metric_id = 10 AND timestamp < '2021-10-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND value > 100.0;
